title: Nazi Germany
brief_description: Presents extracts from newsreels seen by the British public in the 1930’s covering aspects of Nazi Germany. Shows Hitler’s appointment as Chancellor; his election campaigning and subsequent victory; the Nazi regime’s appeal to Austria; Germany’s rearmament; a Nazi rally; the re-militarisation of the Rheinland; the arrival of Jewish refugees in England; and the Nazi march in Prague.
